review: Initally we went to another doctor, when my kid was having fever. There teatment is like trail and error, means try this medicine if not works we will go blood test and other tests and finalize the medicine. Then we visited Umakanth, he perfectly analysis the problem and told this is a viral fever use this medicine it will be cure. Umakanth diagnosis perfectly & will give accordingly. Till now we never went for follow up. For the first time it will be cured.
